Надоело, что уже несколько дней не могу зайти в игру. Постоянно выскакивает ошибка. Единственное решение, которое нашёл - это сносить игру полностью и устанавливать её заново. Очень неудобное решение, поэтому не рекомендую игру до тех пор, пока не решат данную проблему.
Спустя пару обновлений ошибки перестали выскакивать. Теперь античит выкидывает из игры, хотя я никогда не пользовался читами в онлайн играх.

Любопытная игруха. Атмосферка что надо. По первой визжала с неё от страха на всю хату)))) Лично я с неё адреналиню. Очень будоражит играть против таких же игроков в роли маньяков. Все эти тупые боссы, типо страшные, ужас как надоели, а тут живьё. А друзей на крюки повешать.. ммм... милое дело.  Очень нравится реализация героев из фильмов. Предпочитаю сидеть в шкафу за Ненси. ^_^. присаживайтесь на крюк пожалуйста xD

I’ve been playing DBD for quite a long time now, and it’s really become a game that I’ve grown to love. I’ve become more invested in the community over time, like becoming one of the Discord Tutors, and the game feels like it’s in a really good state at the moment. Things like hit detection and matchmaking have improvements being made to help keep the game to feel as fair as it can be, as well as a lot of polishing being done, with the updating of old maps, removal of god loops, and a fair amount of balancing things after their release, and it genuinely feels like the game is in a position to me at the moment where it’s not one-sided at all. I’m also loving the Tomes, giving people a reason to try out some different/quirky perks or trying to play a bit differently to keep it fresh as opposed to just running the same stuff every game, and having the work paid off with some really nice outfits and animations.

I can’t be any happier with DBD right now, and I can’t wait to see what Behaviour have planned next

Good game

TLDR: The game is fun and engaging but is fairly saturated with toxic players including ; trolls, camping killers, survivor working with killers. When you get a good match, survivors are incredibly wholesome and display team work that makes me happy i got the game in the first place. Good killers are also commonly present but the BEST killers are the ones who show mercy. wish gameplay invoving tasks were more diverse instead of just the bar and better perks should be given to survivors. see below for perk idea. 

Hey guys im a new player. Have about 20 hours so far and wanted to give my first impressions of the game. The game is exciting but HOLY SHIT there are so many toxic survivors and killers. Don't know if its because I'm rank 15 but i regularly see survivors working with killers , 1 every 10 games and camping killers , 1 every 4 games. It really takes away the fun of the game so far. But on the bright side its really fun and engaging. On the semi-rare occasion that u get a good teammate and killer , its incredibly fun and surprisingly wholesome. I say wholesome because some survivors will sacrifice themselves for you and if you are the last survivor and get downed. A killer shows a great sign of sportsmanship by taking you to the hatch and letting you escape. You really thrive in games with good teammates as well as killers and brings out the best of the gameplay. I dont know if its on purpose that survivors have a huge disadvantage but a lot of the survivor perks are pretty lackluster. out of what feels like 100 survivor perks there are about 20 perks that are in my opinion really useful. i have no place on commenting in killer gameplay because i only played survivor so far and im gonna keep it that way. I have an idea for what would be a good perk for survivors. 

New Perk: After Image.
When unhooked , the killer will see an after image of the survivor still on the hook for 6 seconds. to give survivors a better chance at escaping and regrouping.
